snippet: It was Eric Chavez who first stated during the Yankees' slump that the loss of Alex Rodriguez was catching up to them and contributing to their lack of success. There may be some truth to that, but it has been Chavez who has excelled in Rodriguez's...
abstract: It was Eric Chavez who first stated during the Yankees' slump that the loss of Alex Rodriguez was catching up to them and contributing to their lack of success. There may be some truth to that, but it has been Chavez who has excelled in Rodriguez's absence, both offensively and defensively.

headline.main: Third Baseman Coming Through for Yankees (Not That One)
